text: The Yokkaichi Challenger is a professional tennis tournament played on hard courts. It is currently part of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) Challenger Tour. It is held annually in Yokkaichi, Japan since 2019.https://www.jta- tennis.or.jp/Portals/0/resources/tournaments/pdf/yokkaichich/2019/2019yokkaichich_fs.pdf ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Championhttps://www.atptour.com/en/tournaments/yokkaichi/8268/overview !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Yūichi Sugita || James Duckworth || 3–6, 6–3, 7–6(7–1) |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Nam Ji-sung Song Min-kyu || Gong Maoxin Zhang Ze || 6–3, 3–6, [14–12] |} ==References== Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Hard court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Japan Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2019
title: Yokkaichi Challenger
